price: ߣߌߒߕߊ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߣߌߡߊ߫ ߟߎ߫ ߕߍ߫ ، ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߝߊ߲߭ ߕߍ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊߥߟߌ߬ ߕߎߡߊ ߟߐ߲߫ ߠߋ߬
arabic: أَمۡوَٰتٌ غَيۡرُ أَحۡيَآءٖۖ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: amwātun ghayru aḥyāin wamā yashʿurūna ayyāna yub'ʿathūna
